name: key.png
description: A colourful, highly detailed, ornate golden key, standing vertically, viewed from the front, against a white background.

name: forge.jpg
description: A full, atmospheric image of a dark, medieval blacksmith's forge, with glowing embers and hammers resting on anvils.

name: sword.png
description: A colourful, epic fantasy sword with a glowing orange hilt, standing vertically with the point downwards, viewed from the front, against a white background.

name: office_2003.jpg
description: A full, wide-angle photo of a realistic, dimly lit office from the early 2003 era, with bulky CRT monitors, beige computers, and cubicles.

name: monitor_graveyard.jpg
description: A full, cinematic image of a vast graveyard filled with old, broken CRT computer monitors instead of tombstones, under a dark, cloudy sky.

name: dark_city.jpg
description: A full, black and white, moody photograph of a sprawling city skyline at night, with rain-slicked streets reflecting the city lights.

name: battered_skyscraper.png
description: A colourful, photorealistic, tall, modern skyscraper with visible cracks, smoke damage, and broken windows, viewed from a low angle, against a white background.

name: pressure_walls.jpg
description: A full, claustrophobic image of two massive, textured stone walls slowly closing in on the viewer's perspective, creating a feeling of immense pressure.

name: blueprint.png
description: A detailed, glowing cyan-blue architectural blueprint drawing of a complex machine, with grids and annotations, on a white background.

name: coin.png
description: A shiny, colourful golden coin with an embossed symbol, slightly angled to catch the light, against a white background.

name: report.png
description: A photorealistic, multi-page financial document with charts and columns of numbers, fanned out slightly, viewed from a top-down angle, against a white background.

name: revenue_pile.jpg
description: A full, dramatic image of an immense, mountain-sized pile of cash bills, filling the entire frame in a dark, cavernous space.

name: profit_spark.png
description: A single, bright, colourful green spark of light with lens flare effects, radiating energy, against a white background.

name: modern_office_background.jpg
description: A full photograph of a sleek, modern, open-plan office interior with glass walls and minimalist furniture, intentionally blurred and darkened for background use.

name: green_line_chart.png
description: A colourful, clear data graph with a vibrant green line showing a steep upward trend, on a gridded axis, viewed straight-on, against a white background.

name: wall_street.jpg
description: A full, iconic, ground-level photograph of the Wall Street bull statue and the New York Stock Exchange building, bustling with activity.

name: futuristic_engine.jpg
description: A full, detailed, science-fiction image of a massive, glowing, futuristic engine core inside a spaceship, with complex pipes and conduits.

name: energy_stream.png
description: A vibrant, colourful, flowing stream of blue and purple plasma energy, with sparks and wisps, moving from left to right, against a white background.

name: finish_line.png
description: A colourful, checkered black and white finish line banner, viewed straight-on as if about to be crossed, against a white background.

name: warehouse_construction.jpg
description: A full, dynamic photograph of a large warehouse under construction, showing steel girders, cranes, and construction workers in action.

name: lab.png
description: A colourful, clean, modern science laboratory with beakers, test tubes, microscopes, and advanced equipment on stainless steel tables, viewed from an eye-level perspective, against a white background.

name: rocket_launch.jpg
description: A full, awe-inspiring photograph of a massive rocket launching into space, with bright flames and billowing smoke, viewed from a distance.

name: chessboard.jpg
description: A full, top-down photograph of a wooden chessboard with pieces set up for a game, blurred and darkened to create a moody atmosphere.

name: glowing_foundation.png
description: A colourful, intricate, glowing geometric pattern resembling a building's foundation, made of lines of brilliant white and gold light, against a white background.
